[b]Description:[/b]
I present to you KMSAuto Net - Program to activate the operating system Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 8.1, the Windows 10, Â the Windows Server (2008, 2008 R2, you in 2012, 2012 R2), as well as Microsoft Office 2010, 2013 volume-editions 2016 More to read about this legendary (you can say so) and download utility KMSAuto Net possible.
How the program works is quite simple: it emulates a KMS-server and the operating system is then activated on it, after which the server is removed. 
In general, the KMS-activation - a perfectly legitimate method to activate Windows, developed by Microsoft itself to activate corporate products, there is nothing new. The fact is that in Windows 8.1, for example, a standard way to connect to the activation server through lokalhost (127.0.0.2-254) is blocked, and so, the utility causes the system to think that the CCM server is not on your computer, and somewhere in the network. What is KMS-activated, can be found on Microsoft's Web site, if desired.
After running, you will have a window of the program with two buttons: "activation" and "information", I think, everything is simple and clear. 
Also, if desired, you can switch the program on advanced, professional mode - this is done in the "About the program "there you can read a little help, a built-in utility and see a video of its functions. 
in addition, the utility has a backup feature and the Windows Product activation recovery (in case if you have already activated it over the phone), you can convert the Retail-edition Office 2013 in the volume, change the editorial Windows, and, in two ways, in this version is integrated utility ShowHideControls with habrahabr also, in the "Tools" you can cause some standard Windows functions (Service Scheduler, etc.), reset the "invalidity" OS (do rearm), which helps in some cases, incorrect activation.
Microsoft Office (2010, 2013) are also easily and conveniently activated, simply press the corresponding button is activated only its volume-version. 
In general, the KMS-activated - it is a separate conversation, you need only be configured using the utility frequency activation confirmation (by default, every 25 days) and forget about it. Â According to the forum, many choose to activate by using the telephone method, well, it's a matter of just select both methods (phone and MMR) work equally reliably at the moment, the only difference is that when phone activation is permanent, or permanent, and when MMR-activate its status must be confirmed every 180 days. The latter is easily achieved by the program and scheduler Windows. Â Finally, the program and its modules are not anything malicious, "embedded" tested how to use Kaspersky Internet Security 2014 (with the latest databases), and on VirusTotal, well, it does not add to, not change and does not delete any system files and services, in addition to folders in the user profile settings. Â it requires installed .NET Framework 4.5, I think, is simple to install, the more that Windows 8.1 is already there. Â So if you do not key to activate and activate the hunt, download and use. ... and good luck in the difficult task of activation of your Microsoft products :)
